subtask_1_output.label: A
subtask_1_output.title: Slow evaporation of tap water
subtask_1_output.summary: Evaporated 1-2 L of tap water in shallow black bowls at room temperature on a windowsill to enrich H2_17O, repeated in batches until over 1 L was collected.

subtask_1_output.label: B
subtask_1_output.title: Fractional distillation of enriched water
subtask_1_output.summary: Performed fractional distillation on ~500 mL of enriched water using a 1 L flask with two condensers to separate fractions at 98.5 oC and 99 oC.

subtask_1_output.label: C
subtask_1_output.title: Electrolysis of H2_17O to produce hydrogen peroxide
subtask_1_output.summary: Electrolyzed 5 mL of H2_17O buffered at pH 7.7 with phosphate buffer and KCl using copper cathode and graphite anode to synthesize H2_17O2.

subtask_1_output.label: D
subtask_1_output.title: Synthesis of 17O-hexanol
subtask_1_output.summary: Synthesized 17O-hexanol by reacting iodohexane with Na17OH (generated from NaH and H2_17O) via an SN2 reaction.

subtask_1_output.label: E
subtask_1_output.title: Preparation of 17O-trimethylsilanol and 17O-hexamethyldisiloxane
subtask_1_output.summary: Prepared 17O-trimethylsilanol and 17O-hexamethyldisiloxane by reacting H2_17O with bis(trimethylsilyl)trifluoroacetamide (BSTFA).

subtask_1_output.label: F
subtask_1_output.title: Preparation of H2_17O2 by electrolysis
subtask_1_output.summary: Produced H2_17O2 by electrolyzing H2_17O, used as a standard for 17O NMR.

subtask_1_output.label: G
subtask_1_output.title: Preparation of 17O-camphor by oxygen exchange
subtask_1_output.summary: Prepared 17O-camphor by exchanging the ketone oxygen of camphor with H2_17O, monitored via NMR.

subtask_1_output.label: H
subtask_1_output.title: NMR spectroscopy of labeled compounds
subtask_1_output.summary: Characterized 17O-labeled compounds (hexanol, camphor, trimethylsilanol, hexamethyldisiloxane, water) using 1H, 13C, and 17O NMR on 600 MHz and 500 MHz spectrometers.
references: Supporting Information, p. S-3 to S-35

subtask_1_output.label: I
subtask_1_output.title: GC-MS analysis of labeled compounds
subtask_1_output.summary: Analyzed 17O enrichment and characterized labeled compounds (hexanol, hexamethyldisiloxane, camphor) using gas chromatography-mass spectrometry with specific oven settings.
references: Supporting Information, p. S-5 to S-6
Supporting Information, p. S-10 to S-11
Supporting Information, p. S-26 to S-28

subtask_1_output.label: J
subtask_1_output.title: Colorimetric assays for H2O2 quantitation
subtask_1_output.summary: Quantified H2_17O2 produced by electrolysis using two colorimetric assays testing its reducing and oxidizing abilities with TCA, KMnO4, Fe(NH4)2SO4, and KSCN.

subtask_1_output.label: K
subtask_1_output.title: Density and refractive index measurement of enriched water
subtask_1_output.summary: Measured density using a pipettor and balance, and refractive index at 589 nm using an Abbe refractometer, to characterize enriched H2_17O.
